name: NOOSS D.J. Bernstein Libraries
short_description:
Using the public domain code available from Daniel J Bernstein 
(http://cr.yp.to/djb.html), create a library or libraries for 
several Operating Systems.  Once the initial code base has 
been completed, expand the libraries and create modules for
